sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Tiger Palm increases the damage of your next melee ability by 5.0%.
Set: Your other melee abilities increase the damage of your next Tiger Palm by 25%, stacking up to 6 times. 15% of Tiger Palm's damage is dealt onto nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,207 Agility. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 89,102 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Use: Increases your Mastery by 6,437 for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Crusher of the Unsettled
description: The best tool for collecting delinquent bar tabs.

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 372,319 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 103,422 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
